**JSON Form Studio** is a lightweight, schema-agnostic web app that converts any valid JSON into a clean, editable form â€” and exports it back as valid JSON.

### âœ¨ Features

* Paste JSON â†’ auto-generated form
* Supports deeply nested objects & arrays
* No backend, no database
* Schema-safe editing (keys locked)
* Export clean JSON
* Runs on GitHub Pages / Netlify / Vercel
